title: John Lasseter
summary: John Alan Lasseter (/ˈlæsətər/; born January 12, 1957)[3] is an American film director, producer, screenwriter, animator, voice actor, and the head of animation at Skydance Animation.[4] He was previously the chief creative officer of Pixar Animation Studios, Walt Disney Animation Studios, and Disneytoon Studios, as well as the Principal Creative Advisor for Walt Disney Imagineering.[5]
